lemma must_wait_elims [consumes 1, case_names lock join interrupt, cases pred]: assumes "must_wait s t lt Ts" obtains l t' where "lt = Inl l" "has_lock (locks s $ l) t'" "t' \<noteq> t" "t' \<in> Ts" | t' where "lt = Inr (Inl t')" "not_final_thread s t'" "t' \<in> Ts" | t' where "lt = Inr (Inr t')" "all_final_except s Ts" "t' \<notin> interrupts s"
